NAME: Name
PLEASE: Please, be as brief and specific as possible
STILL: Still has not created any incident
STILL_ACTIVITY: Still has not created any activity
NOT_ADDED: Still not added any incident to your favorites
NOT_ADDED_ACTIVITIES: Still not added any activity to your favorites
THIS_INFO: This information will be used to create an incident
DRAG: Drag to the approximate location of the incident
ERROR_RECOVERY: Could not recover incidents. Try it again later.
ERROR_RECOVERY_ACTIVITIES: Could not recover activities. Try it again later.
SELECTED_LANGUAGE: The language chosen will be used by default
ALREADY: The incident is already in favorites
ALREADY_ACTIVITY: The activity is already in favorites
THANKS: It will be published once validated. Thank you for your help
YOUR_DATA: Your data will never be published
ERROR_POST: There was an error sending the incident
ERROR_GEO: Sorry, could not retrieve your location
SHARED_FROM: (Shared from the APP Cuida l'Albufera, available on iOS and Android)
